item.description:
We have decided to "detour" from our NearFuturePlan for one meeting. We will read Hume's Dialogues Concerning Natural Religion (http://www.anselm.edu... ) Reading this work is a good choice after Kant's Religion within the Limits of Reason Alone.

Please note that we will not be meeting at the Bombay Club this time but in this new restaurant Shabu.Ya just next door (same level, same building, same hallway, literally next door).
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the philosophy group from the staff.
item.name: Hume: Dialogues Concerning Natural Religion
